Export.Routine:
Start w #, "Welcome to import/export utility for Cache Globals" do {r !, "What do you wanna to do? Type(import/export) :", job} while ((job'="import")&&(job'="export")) if (job="import") { GOTO Import } else { GOTO Export } Quit
Import w #, "Import section:" w !, "Type in filename or type nothing to create socket server: " r filename d ^importGlobal(filename) Quit
Export w #, "Export section:" r !,"Write name of global: ", glob r !,"Write filename or IP(port 7001): ", link d ^exportGlobal(glob,link) Quit
